verbs.description: [V: cavs’] front office frustrated by lack of competitiveness tyronn lue rotations basketball fans in cleveland woke up to surprising news sunday morning tyronn lue who led the cavs to their first championship in franchise history in 2016 was relieved of his duties as head coach the reasoning behind this decision according to chris fedor of cleveland com had a lot to do with the team competitiveness tyronn lue larry drew cleveland cavs cleveland cavaliers
